#### Load Data

Load the pre-processed data saved from the previous step.

```{r}
load("preprocessed_data.RData")

# Check the structure of the main data
str(ces_Modeling)
summary(ces_Modeling)
```


```{r}
# Check the selected model features
print(selected_model_vars)

# Subset the cleaned data using selected features
model_data <- ces_feature_cleaned[, selected_model_vars]

# Add the target variable
model_data$target <- disengaged_group

# Split the dataset into training and testing sets (70/30 split)
set.seed(123)
train_index <- sample(seq_len(nrow(model_data)), size = 0.7 * nrow(model_data))
train_data <- model_data[train_index, ]
test_data  <- model_data[-train_index, ]



```
